name: Afterinfection
description:
What is Afterinfection

AfterInfection combines core elements of classic survival games to create the perfect immersive survival experience for all players. Spawn with nothing and make your way across a large island scavenging for supplies, weapons, and building materials. Pick your fights against other survivors or zombies you encounter then progress in the game to building your own shelter and raiding your enemies. Play in either First or Third person with a fully customized character.

What you can expect from surviving in the world After Infection


Player Vs Player Combat, Player Vs Environment events, Dynamic Zombie AI, Airdrops and other randomly generated procedural Events, freestanding Structures and Upgradable tiered base Building, loot Progression, shelter Raiding, Weather and Day/Night cycle, full crafting system, Hunger/Thirst, Bleeding and Medical equipment, Team/Guild menu, and Beautiful Graphics with realistic physics built in Unreal Engine 4.

Get ready to be immersed in a hardcore survival experience catered to zombie shooter fanatics, casual players, and true survival game enthusiasts

This is AfterInfection.

The game is being developed by a small team of developers with a love of survival games. We are open to all discussion for improving and creating a better survival game feel free to join our discord and become a part of our early access community and help us grow and evolve!

Key features :


• Hunting.
• Base Building.
• Crafting Items.
• Day/Night Cycle
• Weather Cycle.
• 4x4km map.
• Gathering Resources.
• Mining and refining ores.
• Airdrops.
• Food and Thirst management.
• Cooking.
• PvP.
• Groups And Guilds.
